name: deep-cloning
description: Deep copy library for any data structure in JavaScript!

scripts.test:cov: rm -rf ./coverage && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Kafil Uddin Kiron <kafiluddin.kiron@gmail.com>
